q: * Despite Michael Vick 's dark past, Mayor Tom Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway presented the Eagles quarterback with a key to the city of Dallas. The accusations of sexual assault and his four game suspension a distant memory. He sat those games out. The Steelers survived those four games. And then he came back and it appears nobody remembers what he did, Stephen Mosher said. Memories of Michael Vick 's dog fighting conviction and jail time may be harder to shake, but the athlete was easily able to resume his lucrative NFL career after making a few amends.

It means a lot Iverson_Allen Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight Howard_Howard Allen_Orlando_Shaun Johnson_04/05 Three-Tim Duncane scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. "That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."
